attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2019-0375

Date: 2019-04-15

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, advises that the Honourable David Lametti, P.C., be appointed one of Her Majesty’s Counsel learned in the law and that a Commission be issued to him.


Sur recommandation du premier ministre, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l’honorable David Lametti, C.P., soit nommé conseiller juridique de Sa Majesté et qu’une commission lui soit délivrée à cet effet.
attachmentText:
PC Number: 2019-0375Date: 2019-04-15



The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, advises that the Honourable David Lametti, P.C., be appointed one of Her Majesty’s Counsel learned in the law and that a Commission be issued to him.


Sur recommandation du premier ministre, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l’honorable David Lametti, C.P., soit nommé conseiller juridique de Sa Majesté et qu’une commission lui soit délivrée à cet effet.
